description: Simulation of haemodynamic response using the balloon model. Based on the theoretical model proposed by Buxton et al. (1998).

tr.title: Repetition Time
tr.description: Scan repetition time in seconds (TR), the interval at which the output curve will be sampled.

num_scans.title: Number of Scans
num_scans.description: Number of scans (N), the output curve will comprise this number of samples.

event_times.title: Event Times File
event_times.description: The name of a file containing the event timings, in seconds, as ASCII strings separated by white space, with time 0 being the time at which the initial scan occurred.

t_rise.title: Haemodynamic Rise Time
t_rise.description: Haemodynamic rise time in seconds (typically between 4s and 6s).

t_fall.title: Haemodynamic Fall Time
t_fall.description: Haemodynamic fall time in seconds (typically between 4s and 6s).

t_sustain.title: Haemodynamic Sustain Time
t_sustain.description: Haemodynamic sustain time in seconds (typically between 0s and 4s).
